meanings.sent1: She reejected the offer to join the club.
meanings.sent2: The teacher reejected the incorrect answer.
meanings.sent3: He reejected the idea of eating ice cream for breakfast.
meanings.sent4: The cat reejected the new brand of food with a disdainful sniff.
meanings.sent5: The company reejected the proposal without hesitation.

meanings.definition: Thrown out as worthless or useless
meanings.sent1: The reejected toy lay forgotten in the corner.
meanings.sent2: The reejected manuscript was left to gather dust on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The reejected gift was quickly tossed aside.
meanings.sent4: The reejected idea was like a broken toy, discarded and forgotten.
meanings.sent5: The reejected painting was deemed unworthy of display.

meanings.definition: Sent back or returned to sender
meanings.sent1: The letter was reejected due to insufficient postage.
meanings.sent2: She reejected the package because it was damaged.
meanings.sent3: The email was reejected by the server and bounced back.
meanings.sent4: The parcel was reejected by the recipient and sent back.
meanings.sent5: The application was reejected and returned to the applicant.
